bibl.title: When Two Fragments Meet: Sapph. fr. 22 V.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. X, 1231 (= Pack2 1445), frr. 12 and 15. 'Sapph. fr. 22' consists of two different fragments of papyrus which are discontinuous with one another; these two fragments may indeed belong to two different poems.
bibl.seg: YATROMANOLAKIS Dimitrios, When Two Fragments Meet: Sapph. fr. 22 V.

P. Oxy. X, 1231 (= Pack2 1445), frr. 12 and 15. 'Sapph. fr. 22' consists of two different fragments of papyrus which are discontinuous with one another; these two fragments may indeed belong to two different poems.
